entry.summary: Vertex Live on Arbitrum Vertex is now live on Arbitrum, enabling cross-margin trading for spot and derivatives. Vertex combines an off-chain order book layered on top of an on-chain automated market maker on a decentralized, self-custodial exchange.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn $10m Exploit, Ethereum Shanghai Live, Farming on zkSync Era, and More...
entry.summary: Yearn $10m Exploit Yearn is exploited and lost ~$10m. The attacker conducted a flash loan attack through Aave and exploited the Yearn USDT token (yUSDT), then acquired a large number of stables on Curve pool. The team tweets that V1 and V2 vaults are unaffected, and is investigating the contract issue.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Euler Redemption Live, Shanghai Mainnet Coming, Intro to ZK-Rollup L2, and More...
entry.summary: Euler Redemption Live Euler has revised the redemption plan for the exploit. Affected users can now check their redemption numbers at https://redemptions.euler.finance/ Shanghai Mainnet Coming The Ethereum Shanghai upgrade (Shapella) will be activated at block 6209536 (~4/12/2023, 10:27:35 PM UTC).
